Commands ¶ mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. docs.text: Basic ¶ Rendering Equation ¶ L_{\text{o}}(\mathbf x,\, \omega_{\text{o}},\, \lambda,\, t) \,=\, L_{\text{e}}(\mathbf x,\, \omega_{\text{o}},\, \lambda,\, t) \ +\, \int_\Omega f_{\text{r}}(\mathbf x,\, \omega_{\text{i}},\, \omega_{\text{o}},\, \lambda,\, t)\, L_{\text{i}}(\mathbf x,\, \omega_{\text{i}},\, \lambda,\, t)\, (\omega_{\text{i}}\,\cdot\,\mathbf n)\, \operatorname d \omega_{\text{i}} L_{\text{o}}(\mathbf x,\, \omega_{\text{o}},\, \lambda,\, t) \,=\, L_{\text{e}}(\mathbf x,\, \omega_{\text{o}},\, \lambda,\, t) \ +\, \int_\Omega f_{\text{r}}(\mathbf x,\, \omega_{\text{i}},\, \omega_{\text{o}},\, \lambda,\, t)\, L_{\text{i}}(\mathbf x,\, \omega_{\text{i}},\, \lambda,\, t)\, (\omega_{\text{i}}\,\cdot\,\mathbf n)\, \operatorname d \omega_{\text{i}} \omega_{i} \omega_{i} 是入射光的负方向 \lambda \lambda 是波长 \omega_{i}\cdot \mathbf{n} \omega_{i}\cdot \mathbf{n} 也可以写作 \cos\theta_i \cos\theta_i
docs.title: Basic

docs.text: L_{\text{o}}(\mathbf x,\, \omega_{\text{o}},\, \lambda,\, t) \,=\, L_{\text{e}}(\mathbf x,\, \omega_{\text{o}},\, \lambda,\, t) \ +\, \int_\Omega f_{\text{r}}(\mathbf x,\, \omega_{\text{i}},\, \omega_{\text{o}},\, \lambda,\, t)\, L_{\text{i}}(\mathbf x,\, \omega_{\text{i}},\, \lambda,\, t)\, (\omega_{\text{i}}\,\cdot\,\mathbf n)\, \operatorname d \omega_{\text{i}} L_{\text{o}}(\mathbf x,\, \omega_{\text{o}},\, \lambda,\, t) \,=\, L_{\text{e}}(\mathbf x,\, \omega_{\text{o}},\, \lambda,\, t) \ +\, \int_\Omega f_{\text{r}}(\mathbf x,\, \omega_{\text{i}},\, \omega_{\text{o}},\, \lambda,\, t)\, L_{\text{i}}(\mathbf x,\, \omega_{\text{i}},\, \lambda,\, t)\, (\omega_{\text{i}}\,\cdot\,\mathbf n)\, \operatorname d \omega_{\text{i}} \omega_{i} \omega_{i} 是入射光的负方向 \lambda \lambda 是波长 \omega_{i}\cdot \mathbf{n} \omega_{i}\cdot \mathbf{n} 也可以写作 \cos\theta_i \cos\theta_i

docs.text: \rho(\mathbf{r_i})=\sum_j m_j W(\mathbf{r}_i-\mathbf{r}_j,h) \rho(\mathbf{r_i})=\sum_j m_j W(\mathbf{r}_i-\mathbf{r}_j,h)
docs.title: 密度

docs.text: \mathbf{n}(\boldsymbol{r})=\sum_j \frac{m_J}{\rho_j}\nabla^2W(\mathbf{r}-\mathbf{r}_j, h) \mathbf{n}(\boldsymbol{r})=\sum_j \frac{m_J}{\rho_j}\nabla^2W(\mathbf{r}-\mathbf{r}_j, h)
docs.title: 表面法线
压力$$
沾性力(viscosity force)

docs.text: \mathbf{f}_{i}=-\sigma\frac{\mathbf{n}_{i}}{\left\|\mathbf{n}_{i}\right\|}\sum_j\frac{m_j}{\rho_j}\nabla^2W(\boldsymbol{r}_i-\boldsymbol{r}_j, h) \mathbf{f}_{i}=-\sigma\frac{\mathbf{n}_{i}}{\left\|\mathbf{n}_{i}\right\|}\sum_j\frac{m_j}{\rho_j}\nabla^2W(\boldsymbol{r}_i-\boldsymbol{r}_j, h)
docs.title: 表面张力(surface tension force)

docs.text: W(\mathbf{r}, h)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}{\frac{315}{64 \pi k^{9}}\left(h^{2}-r^{2}\right)^{3}} & {0 \leq r \leq h} \\ {0} & {\text { otherwise }}\end{array}\right. W(\mathbf{r}, h)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}{\frac{315}{64 \pi k^{9}}\left(h^{2}-r^{2}\right)^{3}} & {0 \leq r \leq h} \\ {0} & {\text { otherwise }}\end{array}\right. 适用于插值密度
docs.title: Poly6

docs.text: W(\mathbf{r}, h)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}{\frac{15}{\pi h^{6}}(h-r)^{3}\left(r^{2}-\frac{3}{4}\left(h^{2}-r^{2}\right)\right)} & {0 \leq r \leq h} \\ {0} & {\text { otherwise }}\end{array}\right. W(\mathbf{r}, h)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}{\frac{15}{\pi h^{6}}(h-r)^{3}\left(r^{2}-\frac{3}{4}\left(h^{2}-r^{2}\right)\right)} & {0 \leq r \leq h} \\ {0} & {\text { otherwise }}\end{array}\right. 适用于插值压力
docs.title: Spiky

docs.text: W(\mathbf{r}, h)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}{\frac{15}{2 \pi h^{3}}\left(-\frac{r^{3}}{2 h^{3}}+\frac{r^{2}}{h^{2}}+\frac{h}{2 r}-1\right)} & {0 \leq r \leq h} \\ {0} & {\text { otherwise }}\end{array}\right. W(\mathbf{r}, h)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}{\frac{15}{2 \pi h^{3}}\left(-\frac{r^{3}}{2 h^{3}}+\frac{r^{2}}{h^{2}}+\frac{h}{2 r}-1\right)} & {0 \leq r \leq h} \\ {0} & {\text { otherwise }}\end{array}\right. 适用于沾性力
